argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinv.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpinv.2 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpinv.3 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( ( N ` A ) = B -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = ( A G B ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( N ` A ) = B ) -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = ( A G B ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_grporinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = U ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = U ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( N ` A ) = B ) -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = U ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( N ` A ) = B ) -> ( A G B ) = U ) |
| 10 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( ( A G B ) = U -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) G U ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( A G B ) = U ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) G U ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_grpolinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G A ) = U ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) G B ) = ( U G B ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) G B ) = ( U G B ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 3 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_adantrr | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
| 17 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> A e. X ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> B e. X ) |
| 19 | 16, 17, 18 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( N ` A ) e. X /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) |
| 20 | 1 | #P_grpoass | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( ( N ` A ) e. X /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) G B ) = ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) G B ) = ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) G B ) = ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 14, 22 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( U G B ) = ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) ) |
| 24 | 1, 2 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( U G B ) = B ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( U G B ) = B ) |
| 26 | 23, 25 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) = B ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( A G B ) = U ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( A G B ) ) = B ) |
| 28 | 1, 2 | #P_grporid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( N ` A ) e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G U ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 29 | 15, 28 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G U ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G U ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 31 | 30 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( A G B ) = U ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G U ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 32 | 11, 27, 31 | #P_3eqtr3rd | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( A G B ) = U ) -> ( N ` A ) = B ) |
| 33 | 9, 32 | #P_impbida | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = B <-> ( A G B ) = U ) ) |
